==== privateNameStaticFieldClassExpression.ts (2 errors) ====
    class B {
        static #foo = class {
            constructor() {
                console.log("hello");
                ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2584: Cannot find name 'console'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to include 'dom'.
                new B.#foo2();
            }
            static test = 123;
            field = 10;
        };
        static #foo2 = class Foo {
            static otherClass = 123;
        };
    
        m() {
            console.log(B.#foo.test)
            ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2584: Cannot find name 'console'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to include 'dom'.
            B.#foo.test = 10;
            new B.#foo().field;
        }
    }
